Trinity:::


Trinity limps tembled when she heard that Zeni was dead she burst in 
tears and ran to Aerotaur's arms. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "No Trinity it's not you."  He kneels down on one knee to 
look her in 
> the eye.  "A very bad man did something.  He killed Zeni.  We don't 
know why 
> he did it but we think it's safe now."
